title: Fiora is still nerfed badly after the rework.
body:
Everyone who disagrees with me is kind of your typical jerk here. 

They don't like Fiora for one...

They just want to see her down in the gutter because they are Fiora haters from getting beat so much.

I feel like Riot wants to see Fiora a crappy champ as well or they would of given her double lunge and ult back by now.

Why did they have to pick on my main?

To be jerks to me?

replies.body:
Dude, stop. You're the only one who doesn't like the rework. 
I know she's harder to play now, so maybe pick a different champion until you're ready for complex mechanics.

It's a matter of getting 40 and 7 instead of 40 and 0.  

Clearly I am famous and the World's best Fiora but Riot messed with the 1st E-sport and that is something I'd like them to apologize to the entire E-sport community for.

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2lNsy6Kq,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-04-28T15:20:37.055+0000)
>
> It's a matter of getting 40 and 7 instead of 40 and 0.  
> 
> Clearly I am famous and the World's best Fiora but Riot messed with the 1st E-sport and that is something I'd like them to apologize to the entire E-sport community for.

Your match history shows you struggle to win, go positive, and get above 6.5 cs/min most games. So saying you could go 40-0 isn't an argument you can use.
why is this troll still allowed to post
Why are we still feeding him?

> [{quoted}](name=Mecha MaIphite,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2lNsy6Kq,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-04-28T15:28:32.573+0000)
>
> why is this troll still allowed to post

I don't like being called names.  Calling people is a names is a violation of the summoners code.

> [{quoted}](name=Abuses,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2lNsy6Kq,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-28T15:22:20.418+0000)
>
> Quality shitpost{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

Please don't call my post names. That is a violation of the summoners code.
I am unhappy with the new Fiora...   And I will remain unhappy until you give me my champ back Riot.

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2lNsy6Kq,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-04-28T15:23:59.024+0000)
>
> I am unhappy with the new Fiora...   And I will remain unhappy until you give me my champ back Riot.

I will protest in the street!

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2lNsy6Kq,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-04-28T15:24:33.787+0000)
>
> I will protest in the street!

You killed Fiora.   You murdered someone dear to me.

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2lNsy6Kq,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2017-04-28T15:25:32.879+0000)
>
> You killed Fiora.   You murdered someone dear to me.

It's not even her...    You just put her name on it.

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2lNsy6Kq,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-28T15:26:00.891+0000)
>
> It's not even her...    You just put her name on it.

Careless...  I want something done about it. I don't like being ignored.
Well it's been 11 months since you first visited Boards & instantly complained about Fiora, so I don't think anyone gives a fuck about your whines & threats anymore lol.

I guarantee you will have more success with a different build. Try mine at least one game. 

You start refillable potion and long sword, get phage, then ravenous hydra, finish tri force, deaths dance, spirt visage, Deadman plate
Find a new main man. Your missing out on 137/138th of the game.
